objects.text:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design
• Premium beige & tan leather
• Comfortable padded insole
• Lightweight & flexible

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
The banner presents a stylish and warm tone that highlights a premium boho-chic sneaker. It is divided vertically into two halves: a soft cream section on the left and a light tan section on the right. The product image (id: `product_image`) is prominently placed on the right, showcasing intricate floral detailing on the sneaker. The left side contains bold, playful typography with the main heading split between two lines (`heading_1`, `heading_2`), a subheading (`subheading`) underscoring the product category, and a bullet list (`description`) outlining key features. The price (`price`) is bold and attention-grabbing, followed by a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F5EFE6)
- Light Tan (#EADBCB)
- Warm Brown (#A1662F)
- Dark Brown (#5D4037)
- Deep Gray (#4E4E4E)
- Soft Orange (#E88A45)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed shoe with a warm, earthy color palette. Dominant tones include tan (#D6A878), burnt orange (#A9471C), beige (#F6E3C1), and caramel brown (#B76729), which blend seamlessly across the shoe’s varying textures. These tones are highlighted with subtle white accents (#FFFFFF) and light cream (#EFE2C3), enhancing the layered detailing and craftsmanship. The laces and textured patterns add depth and visual contrast, while the soft gray-blue inner lining (#C9D4D6) offers a cool, understated relief. This color palette exudes warmth and organic appeal, perfect for an advertisement that highlights artisanal quality and autumnal sophistication.
